clever.translation[0].definitions[0].def: able to learn and understand things quickly
clever.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Lucy is quite clever and does well at school.
clever.translation[0].definitions[1].def: able to use your intelligence to get what you want, especially in a slightly dishonest way
clever.translation[0].definitions[2].def: skilful at doing a particular thing
clever.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Bill’s very clever with his hands.
He was clever at finding bargains.
clever.translation[0].definitions[3].def: done or made in an unusual or interesting way that is very effective
clever.translation[0].definitions[4].def: used jokingly when someone has done something silly or stupid
clever.translation[0].definitions[4].exa: ‘When I got to the library I found I’d left the books at home.’ ‘That was clever!’
